sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.TaxonomyUtilAjax</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>TaxonomyUtilAjax</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var TaxonomyUtilAjax = Class.create();
	TaxonomyUtilAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	    checkManagerAccess: function() {
	        var taxonomy = this.getParameter('sysparm_taxonomy');
	        var gr = new GlideRecord('taxonomy');
	        gr.addQuery('sys_id', taxonomy);
	        gr.query();
	        if (gr.next() && (gs.hasRole("taxonomy_admin") || sn_uc.UserCriteriaLoader.userMatches(gs.getUserID(), [gr.managers]) || new global.TopicPermissionUtil().isAnyTopicManager()))
	        	return true;
	        return false;
	    },
	
	    type: 'TaxonomyUtilAjax'
	});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-10-21 07:00:13</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>b0f03e0a59d73010f8776ff4b4b3e365</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>TaxonomyUtilAjax</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Content Taxonomy" source="com.snc.taxonomy">0dbb74a43c35311068bcf327dfe37ffd</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b0f03e0a59d73010f8776ff4b4b3e365</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-03-07 14:00:33</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
